item.description:
• Come check out the VegWorcester General Interest Meeting at The Artichoke Food Coop on 800 Main St. Worcester, MA.
  • It is our 2nd general meeting and its is open for current members and new members, volunteers, or people who are just curious to find out what VegWorcester is all about!   
  • We'll do a go-around and introduce ourselves and get to know eachother, and we will talk about what we've been up to as a group this year, and have a list of ways for you to get involved or volunteer for VegWorcester this summer and fall.
  • We'll also do a small casual vegan potluck if anyone wants to bring something...  remember that all ingredients should be vegan (no meat, milk, dairy, eggs, gelatin, etc) and you should bring plates/utensils if needed. But don't worry if you can't bring anything, just feel free to show up!
  • For more info:
  • manda@vegworcester.com
  • http://www.vegworcester.com   
  • http://www.facebook.com/vegworcester
item.how_to_find_us: Park on the street, and come on in.
item.name: VegWorcester General Meeting
